Bannister acknowledges the Fed and Treasury are âall inâ but the S&P 500 is at a place where gross domestic product growth must follow through in the second half of the year. âStrength in defensive sectors relative to cyclicals this week indicates concerns about that second half GDP growth, which only time will clarify,â he said. He said defensive sectors, which have fallen relative to cyclicals since the rally from the March lows, are now likely to do better in comparison.
